SELECT BOARD_ID boardId, TITLE title, CONTENTS contents, FILE_NAME fileName, MEMBER_EMAIL memberEmail, CREATE_AT createdAt, UPDATE_AT updatedAt FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD( TITLE, CONTENTS, MEMBER_EMAIL, FILE_NAME, CREATE_AT, UPDATE_AT ) VALUES( #{title}, #{contents}, #{memberEmail}, #{fileName}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP )
mapper.update: UPDATE BOARD SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENTS = #{contents}, FILE_NAME = #{fileName}, UPDATE_AT = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP WHERE BOARD_ID = #{boardId}
